definitions.text: an arrangement of objects or people side by side in a line
a long continuous strip (usually running horizontally)
examples: a mackerel sky filled with rows of clouds
rows of barbed wire protected the trenches

definitions.text: a linear array of numbers, letters, or symbols side by side
a continuous chronological succession without an interruption
examples: they won the championship three years in a row

definitions.text: the act of rowing as a sport

examples: row the boat across the lake
